general: Implement the 'Swiss & High-Contrast' theme. Use pure white backgrounds and stark black text.
Use 'Space Grotesk' for all headings and 'Inter' for body text.
Buttons must be sharp (rounded-none) and uppercase.
Do not use standard card borders for products; let the image breathe.
Use the 'International Klein Blue' (#002FA7) ONLY for primary actions and active states.
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.

layout_specifics.header: Sticky, glassmorphism effect (bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md). Minimal height (h-16 or h-20). Logo on left, centered nav, right-aligned cart/account.
layout_specifics.hero: Asymmetrical grid. Large image on left (col-span-8), text/CTA on right (col-span-4).
layout_specifics.product_page: Split screen on desktop. Left side: Sticky image gallery (grid or stack). Right side: Scrollable details. NO TABS. Use vertical accordions for 'Details', 'Shipping', 'Reviews'.
layout_specifics.cart: Slide-over drawer (Sheet component) instead of a dedicated page for quick access, but keep full page for checkout.

component_overrides.Button: Remove rounded classes. Add tracking-widest and uppercase.
component_overrides.Input: Remove full border. Use border-b-2 only (underline style) for a cleaner look.
component_overrides.Card: Remove shadow and border. Use transparent background.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
